text: wfaradna ealayhim fi altawrat 'ana alnafs tuqtal balnfs, waleayn tufqa baleyn, wal'anf yujdae balanf, waladhun tuqte baladhun, walsnn tuqlae balsnni, wannah yuqtass fi aljrwh, faman tajawuz ean haqih fi alaqtsas min almuetdy fdhlk tkfyr libaed dhanub almetda ealayh w'izalt lha. waman lam yahkum bima 'anzal allah fi alqisas wghyrh, fawlyk hum almtjawzwn hudud allh
